an4.166:4.3: Dukkhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā, dukkhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā, sukhā paṭipadā dandhābhiññā, sukhā paṭipadā khippābhiññā.
an4.166:5.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yāyaṃ paṭipadā dukkhā dandhābhiññā, ayaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭipadā ubhayeneva hīnā akkhāyati.
an4.166:5.2: Yampāyaṃ paṭipadā dukkhā, imināpāyaṃ hīnā akkhāyati;
an4.166:5.3: yampāyaṃ paṭipadā dandhā, imināpāyaṃ hīnā akkhāyati.
an4.166:5.4: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭipadā ubhayeneva hīnā akkhāyati.
an4.166:6.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yāyaṃ paṭipadā dukkhā khippābhiññā, ayaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭipadā dukkhattā hīnā akkhāyati.
an4.166:7.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yāyaṃ paṭipadā sukhā dandhābhiññā, ayaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭipadā dandhattā hīnā akkhāyati.
an4.166:8.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, yāyaṃ paṭipadā sukhā khippābhiññā, ayaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭipadā ubhayeneva paṇītā akkhāyati.
an4.166:8.2: Yampāyaṃ paṭipadā sukhā, imināpāyaṃ paṇītā akkhāyati;
an4.166:8.3: yampāyaṃ paṭipadā khippā, imināpāyaṃ paṇītā akkhāyati.
an4.166:8.4: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭipadā ubhayeneva paṇītā akkhāyati.
